course_description: Survey of  the legal environment in which business enterprises operate. Topics include jurisprudential thought, sources of law, separation of powers, business ethics, constitutional law, regulation of interstate commerce, bill of rights, administrative law, and civil procedure.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
